pages.title: Wishing upon a star
pages.text: The calmness of the night invites you to lie down in the grass and watch the stars.

pages.title: Shooting Stars
pages.text: The small Shooting Stars are made of a material unknown to you thus far.$(br2)Can you catch one right out of the sky?$(br2)$(italic)Tip: Shooting Stars are much easier to spot when using a Telescope or Night Vision.$()

pages.title: Star Fragments
pages.text: Shooting Stars yield precious resources: a Star Fragment, Stardust and a whole lot of other rare materials.$(br2)Picking up a Shooting Star by crouching and $(l:general/anvil_crushing)smashing it via an Anvil$(/l) will yield double the Star Fragments, albeit at the cost of the other materials.

pages.title: Star Hardening
pages.text: Now that you've collected all the variations, it's finally time to unwind! Hardened with a Diamond the Stars do not break anymore when hit.$(br2)$(italic)Fancy a Starball tournament with your friends?

pages.title: Stardust
pages.text: A powder of unknown origin blessed with the soul of the stars.$(br)Bears coy, yet latent power.
